thobe.widgets.splitPanel

Interface SPComponentDecoratorListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SPSubFrame

    public interface SPComponentDecoratorListener
    Interface representing a listener that can be used to listen for window-events (close, split, maximize) of the top menu-bar of the SPComponentDecorator.
    Author:
    Thomas Obenaus

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onClose()
      Called whenever the close button of the SPComponentDecorator was clicked.
      void onHorizontalSplit()
      Called whenever the horizontal-split button of the SPComponentDecorator was clicked.
      void onMaximize()
      Called whenever the maximize button of the SPComponentDecorator was clicked.
      void onMinimize()
      Called whenever the minimize-split button of the SPComponentDecorator was clicked.
      void onVerticalSplit()
      Called whenever the vertical-split button of the SPComponentDecorator was clicked.
